Reviews.Title: Nice PC
Reviews.Author: MBK
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a nice laptop.  It has finger print security which is a good thing.  I would recommend this PC.

Reviews.Title: I did not purchase this laptop.
Reviews.Author: Norris mendoza
Reviews.Content: But I wish I had. I had a Pavilion Desk Top that lasted 8 years without serving. It ran win XP with SP2.. I'm considering resurrectin it with new software. Unfortunately I  bought an Acer laptop for $439. The price was right. It's the OS I can't stand. I has windows  8. The. Latest thing.  Take it from me - it doesn't work. I hear win 8.1 is a reversion to XP.  But I don't know. It's hard to find. I was told the upgrade was free through the store, but every time I try to open it it can't connect because the server is down. That the story of Widows 8.
